name: TumbleDry
description:
2021 Global Game Jam game

Have you ever wondered how your socks go missing from the dryer? Dryer gnomes! Your objective is to collect all 5 socks as fast as possible while using powerup hats along the way. Each time you pick up a new hat however, you lose the old power. Watch out for spikes! They will cause you to lose all of your powers as well. 

Controls:

A- Left

D- Right

Space- Jump

E- Pickup items

Shift- use incorporeal powerup

Powerups:

Double Jump: Allows you to jump a second time

Shrink: Allows you to access smaller areas

Incorporeal: Hold shift to be able to pass through spikes

Good Luck!

Credits:

Patrick

Justin
